products.name: Sapphire Memory 4 Drawer Divan Set
products.description:
A high 1000 count pocket sprung memory foam bed with a luxury knitted top for extra comfort and support. No turn for easy rotation with a side stitch effect damask border. The bed comes in a luxury chocolate fabric and 4 storage drawers.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Sapphire Memory Side Ottoman
products.description:
A high 1000 count  pocket sprung memory foam bed with a luxury knitted top or extra support and comfort. No turn for easy rotation with a side stitch effect damask border. The bed comes in a luxury chocolate fabric and features a side opening ottoman, compatible to either side of the bed.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Sapphire Memory Front Ottoman Divan Set
products.description:
A high 1000 count pocket sprung memory foam bed with a luxury knitted top for extra support and comfort. No turn for easy rotation with a side stitch effect damask border. The bed comes in a luxury chocolate fabric, featuring a full, front opening ottoman.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Sapphire Memory 2 Drawer Divan Set
products.description:
A high 1000 count pocket sprung memory foam bed with a luxury knitted top for extra comfort. No turn for easy rotation with a side stitch effect damask border. The bed comes in a luxury chocolate fabric with 2 storage drawers.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Sapphire Memory Divan Set
products.description:
A high 1000 count pocket sprung memory bed with a luxury knitted top for extra comfort. No turn for easy rotation with a side stitch effect damask border. The Bed comes in a luxurious chocolate colour fabric and 2 drawers for storage.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Sapphire Memory Mattress
products.description:
Luxury high quality 1000 pocket sprung mattress featuring memory foam under a sumptuous luxury knit tufted top. The mattress features an elegant side stitch effect damask border for extra support and four handles and four vents for rotation and ventillation (this is a non turnable, rotate only mattress) and can be purchased as part of our divan sets.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Mia Ortho 2000 4 Drawer Set
products.description:
Sumptuous high quality 2000 pcoket sprung bed with a luxury tufted knitted finish to both sleep surfaces for ultimate support and comfort. Fully turnable with ortho support. Suitable for people who need extra support. A side stitch effect border offers a traditional finish. Divan base is available in 3 luxury fabrics - Grey, Black or Chocolate and comes with 4 drawers for storage.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Mia Ortho 2000 Side Ottoman
products.description:
Sumptuous high quality 2000 pcoket sprung bed with a luxury tufted knitted finish to both sleep surfaces for ultimate support and comfort. Fully turnable with ortho support. Suitable for people who need extra support. A side stitch effect border offers a traditional finish. Divan base is available in 3 luxury fabrics - Grey, Black or Chocolate and features a side opening ottoman compatible with either side of the bed

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Mia Ortho 2000 Front Ottoman
products.description:
Sumptuous high quality 2000 pcoket sprung bed with a luxury tufted knitted finish to both sleep surfaces for ultimate support and comfort. Fully turnable with ortho support. Suitable for people who need extra support. A side stitch effect border offers a traditional finish. Divan base is available in 3 luxury fabrics - Grey, Black or Chocolate and features a full front opening ottoman.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Mia Ortho 2000 2 Drawer Divan Set
products.description:
Sumptuous high quality 2000 pcoket sprung bed with a luxury tufted knitted finish to both sleep surfaces for ultimate support and comfort. Fully turnable with ortho support. Suitable for people who need extra support. A side stitch effect border offers a traditional finish. Divan base is available in 3 luxury fabrics - Grey, Black or Chocolate and comes with 2 drawers for storage.

Made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Mia Ortho Divan Set
products.description:
Sumptuous high quality 2000 pocket sprung bed with a luxury tufted knitted finish to both sleep surfaces for ultimate support and comfort. Fully turnable with ortho support. Suitable for people who need extra support. A side stitch effect border offers a traditional finish. Divan base is available in 3 luxury fabrics - Grey, Black, or Chocolate and comes as a non-storage base.

Made in the UK and comes with a 1-year manufacturer's guarantee.

products.name: Mia Ortho Mattress 2000
products.description:
Sumptuous high quality 2000 pocket sprung bed with a tufted knitted sleep surface on both sides for ultimate support and comfort. Fully turnable with ortho support. Suitable for people who need extra support. There’s an elegant side stitch effect damask border that offers a traditional finish. This comes with four handles and four vents for rotation and ventilation. This is also available as part of our divan sets.

Made in the UK and has a 1-year manufacturer's guarantee.

products.name: Antoinette 1000 Mattress
products.description: Luxury high-quality 1000 pocket sprung mattress featuring a sumptuous luxury knit tufted top.  The mattress features an elegant side stitch effect damask border for extra support and four handles and two vents for rotation and ventilation. Antoinette is a non-turn rotate the only mattress and is available as part of our divan sets. Made in the UK and comes with 1 years warranty.

products.name: Calm Rest Silk Side Ottoman Divan Set
products.description:
Luxury Pillow Top Bed with a 1000 pocket encapsulated spring with a calming Magarest microquilted knitted fabric with silk fillings to pillow top. The Magnarest fabriche magnetic field is proven to reduce stress, increase deeper sleep and relieve aching muscles and joints. Base comes with a high quality grey fabric with matching headboards available to purchase. Base has a half ottoman which allows storage to end of divan bed.

Made in the UK.
products.short_description: Calm Rest Silk Side Ottoman Divan Set

products.name: Calm Rest Silk Front Ottoman Divan Set
products.description:
Luxury Pillow Top Bed with a 1000 pocket encapsulated spring with a calming Magarest microquilted knitted fabric with silk fillings, for extra comfort to pillow top. The Magnarest fabriche magnetic field is proven to reduce stress, increase deeper sleep and relieve aching muscles and joints. The base comes with a high quality black fabric with matching headboards available to purchase and comes with two continental drawers and two standard drawers.

Made in the UK.

products.name: Calm Rest 4 Drawer Divan Set
products.description:
Luxury Pillow Top Bed with a 1000 pocket encapsulated spring with a calming Magnarest micro-quilted knitted fabric with silk fillings to pillow top. 1000 pocket sprung encapsulated spring unit for extra edge support to the bed. The Magnarest fabric magnetic field is proven to reduce stress, increase deeper sleep and relieve aching muscles and joints. The base comes with high-quality black fabric with matching headboards available to purchase, and 4 drawers.

Made in the UK.

products.name: Calm Rest Silk 1000 2 Draw Divan Set
products.description:
Luxury Pillow Top Bed with a 1000 pocket encapsulated spring with a calming Magarest micro-quilted knitted fabric with silk fillings to pillow top. 1000 pocket sprung encapsulated spring unit for extra edge support to the bed. The Magnarest fabric magnetic field is proven to reduce stress, increase deeper sleep and relieve aching muscles and joints. The base comes with high-quality black fabric with matching headboards available to purchase, and two drawers.

Made in the UK.

products.name: Hope Memory Side Ottoman
products.description:
Contemporary divan bed with medium firm memory mattress (for extra comfort and support) using a framed open coil spring unit with a sumptuous microquilted knitted top and a vertical 3D breathable damask border. The mattress cannot be turned, only easily rotated. The base comes with high quality fabric and matching headboards are available to purchase.

Made in the UK.

products.name: Hope Memory Front Ottoman
products.description:
Contemorary divan bed with medium firm memory mattress (for comfort and support) using a framed open coil spring unit with a sumptuous microquilted knitted top and a vertical 3D breathable damask border. The mattress cannot be turned, but easily rotated. The base comes with a high quality grey fabric with matching headboards available and has a front opening ottoman, which allows full storage to the base.

Made in the UK

products.name: Calm Rest Silk 1000
products.description:
Luxury Pillow Top Bed with a 1000 pocket encapsulated spring with a calming Magarest microquilted knitted fabric with silk fillings to pillow top. 1000 pocket sprung encapsulated spring unit for extra edge support to the bed. The Magnarest fabriche magnetic field is proven to reduce stress, increase deeper sleep and relieve aching muscles and joints. The base comes with a high quality black fabric with matching headboards available to purchase.

Made in the UK

products.name: Hope Memory Mattress
products.description: Great looking value for money memory foam mattress with a modern quilted knit top. The mattress features a stylish breathable 3D damask border for great ventilation and a sumptuous knit quilted top for support and comfort. This comes with 4 handles for easy rotation (this is a non-turn rotation only mattress).  This can also be purchased as part of a divan set. Made in the UK, it comes with a 1-year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Hope Memory 4 Drawer Divan Set
products.description:
Contemporary divan bed with medium firm memory foam mattress for extra comfort and support, using a framed open coil spring unit with a micro-quilted knitted top and a vertical 3D breathable damask border. The base comes with a high-quality black fabric and matching headboards are available.

The Base comes 4 storage drawers and are made in the UK.

images.name: Hope Memory Grey Divan Set – 4 Drawer
images.alt: Hope Memory Grey Divan Set - 4 Drawer

products.name: Hope Memory 2 Draw Divan Set
products.description:
Contemporary divan bed with medium firm memory foam mattress for extra comfort and support, using a framed open coil spring unit with a micro-quilted knitted top and a vertical 3D breathable damask border. The base comes with a high-quality black fabric and matching headboards are available.

The Base comes as a 3-store unit incorporating a front half ottoman and two continental drawers. These are made in the UK.

products.name: Hope Memory Divan Set
products.description: This is a contemporary with medium firm memory mattress for extra comfort and support, using a framed, open coil spring unit with a micro quilted knitted top and a vertical 3D breathable damask border. The base comes with a high quality black fabric with matching headboards that are available. These are made in the UK.

products.name: Sara Ortho Mattress
products.description: This is a fantastic value for money ortho mattress that offers a firm feel from a framed 12.5 gauge open coil spring system. The mattress features a luxury micro-quilted border for excellent support and tufted knit sleep support to both surfaces. This full turntable mattress is also available as part of a divan set. Made in the UK and comes with a 1-year manufacturers guarantee.

products.name: Caitlin Modern Chairs
products.description:
These chairs are made from pine and plywood with a metal gold coloured leg. Pocket springs make for a comfortable seat that is covered in a velvet feel fabric.

Available in Ink and Mustard.

products.name: Dalton Dining Chair
products.description: The Dalton dining chairs in silver fabric are made from a combination of pine and plywood, with the legs made from rubber wood in a natural finish.

products.name: Caitlin Shoe Cabinet
products.description: This shoe cabinet made from grey particle board offers excellent storage for a tidy hallway.

products.name: Metal Base Stool
products.description: Made from MDF and plywood, these stools have metal legs in gold or silver colour and velvet feel fabric on the seat.

products.name: Sara Ortho 4 Drawer Divan Set
products.description: This is a traditional ortho bed with a fully turnable mattress.  It comes with a luxury tufted knitted fabric to both sleep surfaces, and a quilted damask border. Framed firm open oil spring system for extra support. This bed comes with 2 continental drawers and 2 standard drawers, and in a choice of 3 high quality fabrics - grey, chocolate and black. It is made in the UK and comes with 1 year manufacturers guarantee.

images.alt: Sara Ortho Divan with 4 drawers - Grey

images.alt: Sara Ortho Divan with 4 drawers - Grey b

products.name: Mason Sofabed
products.description:
The Mason click clack sofabed offers a generous sleeping area when opened up.  Really useful storage space under the seat.

Storage height: 20cM, width 162cm, depth 76cm.

Available in the following colours: Ash, Dusk, Raspberry, Granite, Heather, Midnight and Saffron.

images.name: Mason – Sunningdale Midnight – Gunmetal – Studio – Angle – Folded

products.name: Tobago Bedframe
products.description:
The Tobago is a smart but contemporary design. With its striking square padded headboard, complemented by the coordinating foot-end.  Under-bed storage is easily accessed from
the front.

Available in silver, grey, sky blue and midnight blue.

products.name: Grand Cayman Bedframe
products.description:
The Grand Cayman is a timeless bed with a classic design and simple silhouette. The high headboard provides great comfort for when sitting in bed reading. Alongside, the bed base provides helpful and generous storage for all your spare bedding and accessories.

Available in Silver, grey, charcoal and midnight blue.

products.name: Antigua Bedframe
products.description: The Antigua is the ultimate in design and luxury. The high-quality plush velvet makes it not only lavish to the eye but delicate to the touch. The impressive rolled headboard and matching foot-end denotes this to be the centre-piece of any room.

products.name: Dominica Bedframe
products.description:
The Dominica bedframe has a simple contemporary design that screams luxury. The upholstered buttoned headboard combined with the contemporary chrome legs elevates both the style and the feel around it.

Available in sky blue, blush pink, grey and midnight blue.

products.name: Mustique Bedframe
products.description:
The Mustique bed has a chic, modern design. With its beautiful pinch pleat detailing on both the headboard and foot board, this stylish bed will complement any bedroom.

Available in grey, silver, sky blue and midnight blue.

products.name: Cuba Bedframe
products.description: The Cuba is a smart yet classy addition for any bedroom. With its curved foot end and headboard conveying a contemporary style along with the essential storage underneath.

products.name: Havana Bedframe
products.description: The Havana ottoman bed combines a sleek style with comfort and storage.  This fantastic frontend lift makes it easily accessible for all your storage items.  Available in neutral colors to compliment all bedrooms.

products.name: St Lucia Bedframe
products.description: The St. Lucia is a sophisticated looking bed. With its high, panelled design headboard and double-winged edge both that extra elegance and support.  The built-in under bed storage allows an excellent solution to organise things that can still be conveniently accessed.

products.name: Sara Ortho 2 Drawer Divan Set
products.description:
This is a traditional Ortho bed with a fully turnable mattress. Comes with a luxury tufted knitted fabric on both sleep surfaces and a quilted damask border. Framed firm open coil spring system for extra support. The bed comes with 2 drawers in a choice of 3 luxury fabrics: Grey, Black, Chocolate. Made in the UK and has a 1-year manufacturer's guarantee.

Available in grey, chocolate and charcoal.

products.name: Sara Ortho Mattress and Bed
products.description:
This is a traditional Ortho bed with a fully turnable mattress in a luxury tufted knitted fabric to both sleep surfaces. Comes with a quilted damask border. Framed firm open coil spring system for extra support. This is made in the UK and comes with a 1-year manufacturer's guarantee.

Available in grey, chocolate and charcoal.

products.name: Vegas Desk with 2 Drawers
products.description: A compact and practical desk, ideal for use at home. Easy to clean hard wearing bleached oak effect melamine with contrasting grey effect doors with unobtrusive inset pull handles. Features metal drawer runners and plenty of cupboard and open storage.

products.name: Dallas Low Bookcase With 3 Shelves
products.description: A neat, graduated bookcase with plenty of differing size storage. Can be used on its own or use several to create a run. made in an easy to clean, hard wearing white and carbon grey oak effect melamine finish with real metal hardware.

images.name: Dallas Low Book case with 3 shelves
images.alt: Dallas Low Book case with 3 shelves

products.name: Dallas Home Office Desk with Drawer
products.description: Ideal for working from home, this desk offers drawer and under desk storage along with dynamic leg design. Made in an easy to clean hard wearing white and carbon grey, oak effect melamine finish with real metal hardware.

images.name: Dallas Home Office Desk with Drawer
images.alt: Dallas Home Office Desk with Drawer

products.name: Stirling Single Pedestal Dressing Table
products.description: Ideal for small rooms, this compact dressing table is finished in white paint with a real stone inset top that is hardwearing and easy to clean. It is easy to assemble, comes with 3 drawers, stained wooden drawers and real metal convex handles.

products.name: Ayr 3 Drawer Bedside Cabinet
products.description: This bedside cabinet features 3 deep drawers and is finished in a luxurious dark carbon grey with accented mirrors. A choice of acrylic or metal handles is supplied with this. This item is easy to assemble and comes with a stain finished wooden drawers.

products.name: Ayr 2 Door 1 Drawer Wardrobe
products.description: A real statement piece - this 2 door, 1 drawer wardrobe is finished in luxurious dark carbon grey, accented with real mirrors. A choice of acrylic and metal handles are supplied. This is easy to assemble and comes with stain finished wooden drawers.

products.name: Casper Office Chair in Grey
products.description: Casper Office Chair on silver coloured legs. Height can be adjusted using the gas lift.

products.name: Indie Ottoman
products.description: Indie Ottoman. This item is perfect as the occasional storage bench or a bedroom ottoman offering plenty of storage. Features diamond stitching and Scandi wood effect legs.

products.name: Florence Ottoman
products.description: Florence Ottoman in Heather. Also available in blush and charcoal. This ottoman provides plenty of storage. Featuring a luxurious velvet look with pinched button detailing on the lid, it also comes with a gas lift hinged lid for ease of use. Perfect as an occasional storage bench or a bedroom ottoman.

products.name: Davis Ottoman in Charcoal
products.description: Davis Ottoman in Charcoal with black legs. This Ottoman with a lovely button top detailing can be used as the perfect occasional storage bench or as a bedroom ottoman. The lid comes with a gas lift for easy operation.  Requires full assembly.

products.name: Elisa Double Bed in Hopsack Grey
products.description: Elisa Double Bed in Hopsack Grey. This pine bed comes with fabric upholstered frame straight slats for extra support and comfort. The soft-touch fabric will suit any room colour and the headboard has a simple yet beautiful line detailing.

products.name: Captain Bed in Grey
products.description: Captain Bed in Grey. Frame and legs are made from rubberwood. Mattress not included.

products.name: Pippa Loveseat in Grey
products.description: Pippa Loveseat in Grey. This sturdy seat has a frame made from a mix of eucalyptus and ply wood. Solid stainless steel tapered legs finished in a gold colour. This petite cocktail sofa is made from non-marking velvet with a linear stitch detailing and button detail, with a comfortable spring and webbing seat.

products.name: Chloe Chair in Grey
products.description: Chloe Chair in Grey. This seat in an attractive design features a pocket sprung seat, making it very comfortable and durable. The legs are metal finished in silver colour.

products.name: Eliza Chair in Silver Zebra
products.description: This stunning Eliza Chair in Silver Zebra is made from eucalyptus and ply wood.  The black tapered rubber wood legs offer a beautiful contrast.  The seat is made of spring and webbing, and along with the cooped back, makes it very comfortable.

products.name: Jess Chair
products.description: Our fashionable Jess Chair in grey has a comfortable seat with pillow support and contrasts well with the gold-coloured metal legs and frame. Built with durability in mind.

products.name: Shell Chair
products.description:
Our Shell Chair in blush pink is made from a combination of pine and plywood and sits on rubberwood legs finished with a natural look. Pocket springs make for a comfortable seat.

Available in Navy, Mink and Blush Pink.

products.name: Isabel Chesterfield Chair
products.description: This stunning Isabel Chesterfield Chair in grey features pocket springs that make for a very comfortable seat. The frame is made from pine and plywood and it rests on rubberwood legs, in a smart contrasting dark wood finish.

products.name: Isabel Chesterfield 2 Seater Sofa
products.description: This stunning Isabel Chesterfield 2 seater sofa in grey features pocket springs that make for a very comfortable seat. The frame is made from pine and plywood and it rests on rubberwood legs, in a smart contrasting dark wood finish.

products.name: Isabel Chesterfield 3 Seater Sofa
products.description: This stunning Isabel Chesterfield 3 seater sofa in grey features pocket springs that make for a very comfortable seat. The frame is made from pine and plywood and it rests on rubberwood legs, in a smart contrasting dark wood finish.

products.name: Myles Corner Sofabed in Grey
products.description: Myles Corner Pop-up Sofabed in Grey is made from eucalyptus with black legs. Pocket springs make this a very comfortable sofa and bed.

products.name: Remi Sofabed in Grey
products.description: This click-clack Remi Sofabed in Grey is made from eucalyptus and ply wood on matt black metal hairpin legs.  Featuring a soft woven fabric, pocket springs ensure comfort and the pillow seam detail and linear stitching detail finish the look.

products.name: Oslo Single Chair
products.description: The Oslo Single Chair in grey is made from a combination of pine and plywood on rubber wood legs in a dark natural finish.  Pocket springs make a very comfortable seat.

products.name: Oslo 2 Seater Sofa in Grey
products.description: The Oslo 2 seater sofa in grey is made from a combination of pine and plywood on rubber wood legs in a dark natural finish.  Pocket springs make a very comfortable seat.

products.name: Oslo Sofabed in Grey
products.description: The Oslo click-clack Sofabed in grey is made from a combination of pine and plywood on rubber wood legs in a dark natural finish.  Pocket springs make it very comfortable.

products.name: Lux Sofabed
products.description:
This click-clack Lux Sofabed in orange is made from eucalyptus wood with contrasting black metal legs. Offers a good 123 cm of sleeping space.

Also available in blue and grey.

products.name: Juno Sofabed
products.description:
Our click-clack Juno Sofa bed is made from a combination of eucalyptus and plywood on metal gold coloured legs. Perfect in a compact space, this is made in a non-marking velvet finish with button detail.

Also available in blush, grey and mustard.

products.name: Vegas Tall Workstation
products.description: Optimise your home office space with this compact, practical tall work station, that comes with ample desk space and plenty of shelving and storage space. It is finished in a hard wearing, easy to clean bleached oak effect melamine. Handy shelf and storage areas.
products.short_description: Vegas tall workstation with keyboard shelf and storage unit.

images.name: Vegas Workstation with Shelf and Storage unit
images.alt: Vegas Workstation with Shelf and Storage Unit

products.name: Vegas Workstation With Keyboard Shelf
products.description: Where space is at a premium, this simple home work station is so practical with a work and shelf area, all in one. It has an easy to clean, bleached oak effect melamine finish which is also hard wearing. This is a compact and handy shelf.

products.name: Vegas Wall Storage Unit
products.description: Ideal for use with our desk for extra wall storage or on its own, anywhere in your home. Made in a bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with neat inset pull handle. Standard wall fixings are included but you may need specialist fittings depending on your wall type. Offers cupboard and open storage and adjustable hinges. Comes in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish.

products.name: Vegas Tall Drinks Cabinet
products.description: Lots of storage in a compact space, this tall drinks cabinet offers ample storage for bottles and glassware. Made in a bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Comes in an easy to clean, hard-wearing finish.

products.name: Vegas High Sideboard
products.description: A super high sideboard that offer endless open and enclosed storage possibilities. Made in bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Comes in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish and features adjustable hinges.

products.name: Vegas Small Sideboard
products.description: A compact sideboard with plenty of cupboard and drawer space. Made in a bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Also features adjustable hinges and an easy to clean, hard wearing finish. The drawers are on metal runners.
products.short_description: Vegas small sideboard with 2 doors and a drawer

products.name: Vegas Bar Cabinet
products.description: A Contemporary drinks bar that is practical and stylish with plenty of room for bottles and glassware. Made in a bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Features storage slots for bottles and comes in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish.

products.name: Vegas Display Bookcase
products.description: This display bookcase features an abundance of shelving space plus  handy enclosed storage area behind a drop down door. Made in a bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with pull back handles and hairpin shaped legs. Comes in an easy to clean, hardwearing finish.

products.name: Vegas Large Sideboard
products.description: This stylish and practical sideboard made from easy to clean melamine board finished in a bleached oak effect contrasting grey effect doors finished with pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Plenty of storage space with this unit.

products.name: Vegas Wine Cabinet
products.description: This wine cabinet features plenty of bottle storage alongside a glass door enclosed space to store glassware including wine glass hanging unit. Below is a double door cupboard offering even more space. Made in a bleached oak effect with contrasting matt grey finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Comes in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish.

products.name: Vegas Coffee Table
products.description: This coffee table fuses metal with a bleached oak effect with a contrasting matt grey effect and black metal hairpin shaped legs. This comes in an easy to clean, hard-wearing finish and has large storage under the tabletop. It is an ideal centrepiece.

products.name: Nevada Tall Drinks Cabinet
products.description: Lots of storage in a compact space , this tall drinks cabinet offers ample storage for bottles and glassware. Made in a smoked oak effect with contrasting bleached grey oak finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Also features a bottle rack and comes in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish.

products.name: Nevada High Sideboard
products.description: A super high sideboard that offers endless open and enclosed storage possibilities. Made in a smoked oak effect with contrasting bleached grey oak finish with black pull handles and real metal hairpin shaped legs. Also features adjustable hinges and an easy clean hard wearing finish.

products.name: Nevada Small Sideboard
products.description: A compact sideboard with plenty of drawer and cupboard space. Made in smoked oak effect with contrasting bleached grey oak finish with black pull back handles and hairpin shaped legs. This item is made in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish, has adjustable hinges and the drawers are on metal runners.
products.short_description: Nevada small sideboard with 2 doors and a drawer.

products.name: Nevada Bar Cabinet
products.description: A contemporary drinks bar that is practical and stylish with plenty of room for bottles and glassware. Made in a smoked oak effect with contrasting bleached grey oak finish with black pull back handles and hairpin shaped legs. Comes in an easy to clean, hard wearing finish.

products.name: Nevada Display Bookcase
products.description: This display bookcase features an abundance of shelving space plus a handy enclosed storage area behind a drop down door. Made in a smoked oak effect with contrasting bleached grey oak finish with black pull handles and hairpin shaped legs. Comes in ab easy to clean, hard wearing finish.

products.name: Nevada Large Sideboard
products.description: This stylish and practical sideboard is made from easy to clean melamine board, finished in a smoke effect with contrasting bleached grey oak effect doors, with black pull back handles and hairpin shaped legs.
